<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MJ_GameOver" width="600" height="1000" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="result" width="751" height="284" x="300" y="300" anchorOffsetX="368.48" anchorOffsetY="138.81" source="mj_over_failure_png" skewX="0" skewY="0" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6"/>
	<e:Image id="back" width="306" height="147" x="180" y="480" anchorOffsetX="149.74" anchorOffsetY="73.89" source="mj_over_backtohall_png"  scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6"/>
	<e:Image id="continue" width="306" height="147" x="430" y="480" anchorOffsetX="148" anchorOffsetY="75" source="mj_over_continue_png" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HallSkin" width="600" height="1000" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  >
	<w:Config id="164fe9c9fb8" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image width="100" height="100" x="29" y="35" source="mj_hall_touxiangkuang_png"/>
	<e:Image width="130" height="45" x="155" y="40" source="mj_hall_Dbeijing_png" alpha=".8"/>
	<e:Image width="130" height="45" x="155" y="90" source="mj_hall_Dbeijing_png" alpha=".8"/>
	<e:Image width="150" height="25" x="300" y="50" source="mj_hall_diamondbeijing_png"/>
	<e:Image width="150" height="32" x="300" y="100" source="mj_hall_goldbeijing_png"/>
	<e:Image width="60" height="60" x="499" y="40" source="设置1_png"/>
	<e:Label text="设置" x="509.82" y="105.16" size="20" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xe98f36"/>
	<e:Label text="世外高人" x="163.67" y="50"/>
	<e:Label text="ID:" x="172" y="97.5"/>
	<e:Image width="150" height="150" x="54" y="196.84" source="mj_hall_qinyousai_png"/>
	<e:Image width="135" height="135" x="414.82" y="213.68" source="mj_hall_bisai_png"/>
	<e:Image width="70" height="50" x="54" y="917" source="mj_hall_renwu_png" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Image width="70" height="50" x="202.67" y="915" source="mj_hall_haoyou_png" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Image width="50" height="50" x="347.34" y="912.33" source="mj_hall_daoju_png" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Image width="50" height="50" x="480.65" y="915" source="mj_hall_mall_png" scaleX="1.2" scaleY="1.2"/>
	<e:Label text="好友" x="231.16" y="953.98" size="15" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xead7a6" border="true"/>
	<e:Label text="商城" x="364.81" y="955.32" size="15" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xead7a6" border="true"/>
	<e:Label text="背包" x="494.94" y="956.64" size="15" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xead7a6" border="true"/>
	<e:Image id="_rectPlay" width="200" height="130" x="363" y="342.97"  source="mj_hall_primary_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_midPlay" width="200" height="130" x="355" y="492.99"  source="mj_hall_intermediate_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_highPlay" width="200" height="135" x="354" y="635.99"  source="mj_hall_gaojichangover_png"/>
	<e:Image width="231" height="131" x="96" y="643.99" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="mj_hall_enterroom_png" scale9Grid="37,41,227,252" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image width="390" height="130" x="125.3" y="815.6" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="34.6" source="mj_hall_qucikstart_png" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image width="301" height="334" x="79.4" y="343.97" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" source="mj_hall_gettingroom_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ReadyViewSkin" width="600" height="1000" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="164fd606455" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="_imgLeftHead" width="80" height="80" x="77" y="483" source="mj_headImg_1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgMyHead" width="80" height="80" x="260" y="658" source="mj_headImg_2_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgRightHead" width="80" height="80" x="430" y="484" source="mj_headImg_3_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgTopHead" width="80" height="80" x="260" y="270" source="mj_headImg_4_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgLeftReadyStatus" width="80" height="80" x="156" y="481" source="mj_ready_readystatus_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgMyReadyStatus" width="80" height="80" x="260" y="578" source="mj_ready_readystatus_png" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgRightReadyStatus" width="80" height="80" x="349" y="483" source="mj_ready_readystatus_png"/>
	<e:Image id="_imgTopReadyStatus" width="80" height="80" x="260" y="350" source="mj_ready_readystatus_png"/>
	<e:Button id="_btnChangeTable" label="" x="116" y="852" enabled="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mj_ready_changeTable_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="_btnReady" width="128" height="42" x="372" y="852" source="mj_ready_ready_png"/>
	<e:Label id="readyInfo" text="" x="292" y="146.53" anchorOffsetY="29.53" height="58" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" anchorOffsetX="52" width="108"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_back" width="103" height="87" x="54" y="74.85" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="45.85" source="mj_backbutton_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UIViewSkin" width="600" height="1000" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="164f3910ad1"></w:Config>
	<e:Group id="groupBottom" width="600" height="107" x="0" y="893" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Rect width="600" height="90" x="0" y="15" fillColor="0x383636" />
		<e:Image id="_imgMenu" width="60" height="60" x="37.27" y="64" verticalCenter="6" source="mj_game_menu_png" />
		<e:Button id="_imgBan" width="80" height="90" x="160" y="64" verticalCenter="6" enabled="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mj_game_bomb0_png" source.down="mj_game_bomb1_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_imgEye" width="80" height="90" x="260" y="64" verticalCenter="6" enabled="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mj_game_eye0_png" source.down="mj_game_eye1_png" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_imgFlash" width="80" height="90" x="360" y="64" verticalCenter="6" enabled="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mj_game_refresh0_png" source.down="mj_game_refresh1_png" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_imgLight" width="80" height="90" x="460" y="64" verticalCenter="6" enabled="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mj_game_tips0_png" source.down="mj_game_tips1_png" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<!--<e:Image id="_imgEye" width="80" height="90" x="260" y="64" verticalCenter="6" source="mj_game_eye0_png"
		             source.down="mj_game_eye1_png" />
		<e:Image id="_imgFlash" width="80" height="90" x="360" y="64" verticalCenter="6" source="mj_game_refresh0_png"
		         source.down="mj_game_refresh1_png" />
		<e:Image id="_imgLight" width="80" height="90" x="460" y="64" verticalCenter="6" source="mj_game_tips0_png"
		         source.down="mj_game_tips1_png" />
		-->
		<e:Image id="_imgPlayerOne" width="50" height="50" x="135" y="6" source="mj_headImg_1_png" alpha="0"
		         anchorOffsetX="25" anchorOffsetY="25" />
		<e:Image id="_imgPlayerTwo" width="50" height="50" x="197" y="-35" source="mj_headImg_2_png" alpha="0"
		         anchorOffsetX="25" anchorOffsetY="25" />
		<e:Image id="_imgPlayerThree" width="50" height="50" x="260" y="6" source="mj_headImg_3_png" alpha="0"
		         anchorOffsetX="25" anchorOffsetY="25" />
		<e:Label id="tip_num" text="" x="503.69" y="32.5" anchorOffsetX="0.69" width="25" anchorOffsetY="11.5" height="23"
		         size="20" textAlign="center" />
		<e:Label id="_reflashCount" text="" x="405" y="31.9" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="11.9" width="23" height="21"
		         size="20" textAlign="center" />
		<e:Label id="strong_tip" text="" x="318" y="30" anchorOffsetX="16.5" width="32" anchorOffsetY="10" height="21" size="20" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xfcaf25"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="_groupTop" width="600" height="150" x="0" y="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="UITop" width="687" height="497" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  >
	<e:Group x="200" top="50">
	    <e:Rect width="350" height="25" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xF2A44F" ellipseHeight="30" ellipseWidth="30" right="10" top="7"/>
		<e:Image width="343" height="21" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="11.55" right="14" top="9"  source="mj_progresss_bar_png"/>
		<e:Rect id="progress_bar" width="0" height="20" anchorOffsetX="0" fillColor="0xfcf50a" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" top="10" strokeColor="0xe0bf16" left="2" anchorOffsetY="9.75"/>
	</e:Group>

	<e:Image id="sun_img" width="128.66" height="110" x="539.62" y="75.18" anchorOffsetX="61.49" anchorOffsetY="62.58" source="mj_light_bag_png" alpha="0.6"/>

	<e:Group id="_groupClock" x="94.5" y="34.96" anchorOffsetX="0" width="73" anchorOffsetY="0" height="72.67">
		<e:Image width="71.1" height="78.9" x="0.95" y="-1.62" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" source="mj_countdown_png"/>
		<e:Label id="_clockLabel" text="" x="15.24" y="22.72" anchorOffsetX="0" width="41.2" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.6" size="20" fontFamily="Arial" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image  id="headImg" width="44" height="44" x="205" y="32.34" anchorOffsetX="21" anchorOffsetY="22.34" source="mj_player_png"/>
	<e:Label id="ready_info" text="" x="286" y="75.6" anchorOffsetX="30" width="60" anchorOffsetY="15" height="30" horizontalCenter="-212.5" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" scaleX="2" scaleY="2"/>
	<e:Rect width="101" height="34" x="301" y="89.1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillColor="0xeaf2d0" ellipseHeight="30" ellipseWidth="30"/>
	<e:Label id="next" text="下一关" x="311" y="93.1" size="25" borderColor="0x140101" textColor="0x1e0505" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image id="btn_back" width="92" height="92" x="46.69" y="62.81" anchorOffsetX="44.69" anchorOffsetY="46.81" source="mj_backbutton_png"/>




</e:Skin>
